title: The Biggest Things in Free Agency So Far
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Steven start by discussing Baker Mayfield’s emotional letter to Browns fans and what it does for the franchise. Then they talk about the biggest things to happen during the free agency period.

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
